scripts.publish:npm: NODE_ENV=production && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npx babel src/actionCreator --out-dir dist/actionCreator --copy-files && npx babel src/saga --out-dir dist/saga --copy-files && npx babel src/config.js --out-dir dist/config.js --copy-files && npx babel src/index.js --out-dir dist/index.js --copy-files
